convert_photos_to_video: ffmpeg -f concat -safe 0 -i image_files.txt -vsync vfr -vcodec libx264 -vf "scale=1920:1080:force_original_aspect_ratio=decrease,pad=1920:1080:(ow-iw)/2:(oh-ih)/2" -pix_fmt yuv420p output.MOV
add_audio_to_video: ffmpeg -stream_loop -1 -i audio.mp3 -i output.MOV -c:v copy -c:a aac -shortest image_audio_video.MOV
